com.futuresailors.battleships.model

Class Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.futuresailors.battleships.model.Grid

  • public class Grid
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a grid that ships can be placed on.
    Author:
    Michael Conroy

      Grid constructor using preset size.

      Grid constructor to specified size.

      • dropBomb

        public boolean dropBomb(java.awt.Point target)
        Drops a bomb on a grid tile.
        Parameters:
        target - A point representing the location to bomb.
        Returns:
        Boolean if it was hit or miss.

      • getTile

        public GridTile getTile(java.awt.Point pos)
        Returns the value of what is in the given tile.
        Parameters:
        pos - The tile that should be returned.
        Returns:
        A char that is the value in the requested tile.

      • checkGameOver

        public boolean checkGameOver()

      • hoverShip

        public void hoverShip(java.awt.Point pos,
                      Ship ship)
        Sets a collection of tiles to 'H' which the view then knows to render as a tile being hovered over.
        Parameters:
        pos - The top left position to represent the ship.
        ship - The ship currently being placed.

      • hoverBomb

        Sets a collection of tiles to 'H' which the view then knows to render as a tile being hovered over.
        Parameters:
        pos - The top left position to represent the ship.

      • getGrid

        public GridTile[][] getGrid()
        Returns:
        The grid - 2D Array of chars.

      • checkValidPlace

        public boolean checkValidPlace(java.awt.Point pos,
                               Ship ship)
        Takes a ship and a top left position. Then checks whether it is a valid place for the ship to be placed. ie. it isn't off the grid and there isn't already a ship there.
        Parameters:
        pos - Top left position to place the ship.
        ship - The ship being placed.
        Returns:
        True if the ship can be legally placed there. False if not.

      • createCircleGrid

        public void createCircleGrid()
        Creates a circle grid.

      • createDreadnoughtGrid

        public void createDreadnoughtGrid()
        Creates a dreadnought map.

      • createCorvetteGrid

        public void createCorvetteGrid()
        Creates a corvette map.

      • placeShip

        public void placeShip(java.awt.Point pos,
                      Ship ship)
        Drops the ship onto the grid and marks the tiles it has been placed as S. Also updates the ships object itself so it knows it has been placed.
        Parameters:
        pos - Top left position of the position to place the ship.
        ship - The ship being placed.
